summary: "Thor" is a 2011 superhero movie about the Marvel Comics character Thor. Directed by Kenneth Branagh, it stars Chris Hemsworth as Thor, who is banished from his home world Asgard to Earth, losing his powers and hammer. While his brother Loki plots to take over Asgard, Thor must become worthy again. The film went through years of development before finally being released as part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. It was a hit with critics and audiences, leading to three sequels.
title: Thor (film)
